bugs: [Bug] Logging in can now be done on multiple browsers, however there is a catch. Session records clean up and update properly now, too. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/102)
[Feature] - Can now imply folder index files. See documentation/system/imply-folder-indexes.md fo more information [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/118)
[Feature] - Can now set custom index files for folders! See documentation/system/set-folder-index.md for information. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/117)
